abstract: For weeks now, the two biggest issues in Congress have been cleaning up Wall Street and cleaning up the Gulf Coast — and prominent lobbyist Tony Podesta has had a big hand in both.
snippet: For weeks now, the two biggest issues in Congress have been cleaning up Wall Street and cleaning up the Gulf Coast — and prominent lobbyist Tony Podesta has had a big hand in both.
lead_paragraph: For weeks now, the two biggest issues in Congress have been cleaning up Wall Street and cleaning up the Gulf Coast.

headline.main: Lobbyist Says It’s About Information, Not Influence

abstract: An investor group led by Colony Capital and General Atlantic have sewn up their deal to buy First Republic from Bank of America with $1.86 billion in new equity capital.
snippet: An investor group led by Colony Capital and General Atlantic have sewn up their deal to buy First Republic from Bank of America with $1.86 billion in new equity capital.
lead_paragraph: An investor group led by Colony Capital and General Atlantic have sewn up their deal to buy First Republic from Bank of America with $1.86 billion in new equity capital, The Associated Press reported.
